benchmark_details.name: TrueMICL
benchmark_details.overview: TrueMICL is a MICL-dedicated dataset designed to evaluate and enhance true multimodal in-context learning capabilities by requiring models to comprehend visual information from demonstrations to succeed in tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To effectively evaluate and improve the true multimodal in-context learning capabilities of models by emphasizing the importance of visual context in task completion.

data.source: Generated dataset specifically for evaluating multimodal in-context learning.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is computed as the number of correctly predicted answers over the total number of evaluated samples.
methodology.interpretation: The accuracy denoted in percentage indicating the model's performance in tasks.
methodology.validation: Extensive experimental validation through various models showing improvement with the dataset.
